title: Jr. 1 Bedroom Available NOW, Pet Friendly: LxG
posting_body: ['Jr. 1 Bedroom AVL NOW!', 'Walk to Lake Merritt', 'Property Address', '340 Lenox Ave | Unit G | Oakland, CA 94610', 'Available: NOW', 'Offered By', 'Kasa Properties', 'Description', 'GREAT FEATURES', '-\tJr. One Bedroom Apartment in best of Adams Point', '-\t300ft across the street from Lake Merritt Parks and Gardens', '-\tConvenient unit on the 1st floor in a well maintained 7-unit apartment --quiet, secure and great neighborhood', '-\tRemodeled kitchen with granite counter, new cabinets, refrigerator, and gas range', '-\tBedroom with built-in bookshelf and closet', '-\tRemodeled all tile full bath', '-\tFully remodeled with new tile floor through out', '-\tSecured private gate entry to the unit', '-\tOn-site coin-operated laundry', '-\tSerene common garden and fenced backyard', '-\t**-  Small Dogs can be considered with $100/month additional pet fee.', 'There is closed fenced backyard for your dogs.', '-**-', 'LOCATION', '-\tBest in Adams Point, across the street from Lake Merritt Parks and Gardens', '-\tWalk Score of 90 out of 100.', "It is a walker's paradise", '-\tCentrally Located -- Easy access to Lake and Uptown/downtown area', '-\t300ft across the street from Lake Merritt Parks and Gardens', '-\tPerfect for Commuters, including 13 minutes’ walk to 19th Street BART station', "-\tFull range shopping convenience with Whole Foods and Trader Joe's nearby.", "-\tThere is a walking and jogging path which runs along the lake's perimeter and tenants can use it daily.", '-\tEasy access to Broadway, Grand and Lakeshore Ave shopping areas', "-\tEasy walk to Grand Lake Theater and Saturday Farmer's Market", 'Details', 'Beds/Baths: 1.0BA', 'Square Feet: 266', 'Rental Terms', 'Rent: $1,795.00', 'Available: NOW', 'Application Fee: $45.00', 'Security Deposit: $2,400.00', 'Pet Policy', 'Cats allowed', 'Dogs allowed']
